topics.body: So, if there was a game where you were an omnipotent god in charge of the whole world, what would you guys do with it?
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ace62163687278b8390000#post_53ace62163687278b8390000
Well, Chie confessed her love to Luffy but got shot down. She's depressed now. Rider just wants to play games all the tim and Tomoko is the most popular girl on the island
